landing.title: Free Job Placement and Outcomes Data.
landing.introduction: WorkAmerica is a free platform that connects your students and grads to our network of employers, and provides you with Gainful Employment and Perkins data for free!

benefits.title: Increase employment opportunities for your students and graduates
benefits.description: For free, we provide you with any placement data we collect, to supplement your Gainful Employment and Perkins reporting and other reporting requirements.

features.featureContent: We partner with colleges to pre-populate student and graduate profiles on our platform, and we re-engage with the students digitally.
We help you establish and develop strong relationships with employers.
We supplement your data driven approach to best practices in workforce development.

benefits.title: Track job placement outcomes
benefits.description: We market the relevance of your credentials to employers nationwide.

benefits.title: Build and strengthen industry relationships
benefits.description: We market the relevance of your credentials to employers nationwide.

callToAction.title: Curious about bringing WorkAmerica to your campus?
callToAction.introduction: Let's have a quick call to explore the opportunity. Remember that we are really truly 100% free to you and your students, and our onboarding takes a matter of minutes.
